name: Ivan adventures
description:
Discord server of our game: https://discord.gg/R2Vraabr

//===============How to play===================\\

Upon entering the level, you can see 2 opponents and three weapons on top of the screen. The essence of the game is to defeat all enemies. For this you need a weapon. Each one is unique. The bow goes first. It can do 34, 38, or 40 damage. The sword always deals 38 damage.  A shield and knife can only deal 35 damage, but they block 5 damage from enemy attacks. You can hit an opponent by clicking on any weapon and clicking on it.

And yes, please leave more comments.
